entry.title: Combined summary - network topology and routing
entry.summary: The Lightning Network is a proposed off-chain scaling solution for Bitcoin that aims to increase transaction speeds and reduce fees through a network of interconnected payment channels. There is a consensus regarding the target network topology, which implies multiple paths to a target user and the need for several hops to reach them. However, this puzzles one participant who expected the network topology to look different. The goal is to optimize a formula that minimizes the number of channels and hops. Routing should reduce the number of hops as it is faster and cheaper. Having an application-level routing on top of IP routing is necessary due to concerns about blocking payments and communication blockages.One participant suggests having a limited number of specialized supernodes to optimize efficiency, but this could be detrimental to privacy. Joining the lightning network can be expensive, and there is a risk of payments being blocked or communication blockages occurring. Despite these concerns, having a handful of channels set up with well-connected nodes could alleviate some of these issues.In an email conversation between Rusty Russell and Pierre, the idea of a flatter design for Lightning Network was discussed. They agreed on the advantages of having everyone running a node despite initial thoughts of having a limited number of specialized supernodes. However, Pierre raised concerns about the reliability and low latency of having many small nodes constantly appearing and disappearing. Rusty believes that these issues can be mitigated by having every participant of the network connected to a few nodes and being clever with routing.Overall, the Lightning Network seeks to optimize the number of channels and hops while minimizing fees and increasing transaction speeds. The necessity of an application-level routing on top of IP routing is emphasized due to concerns about blocking payments and communication blockages. While there are risks associated with joining the network, having a handful of channels set up with well-connected nodes may help alleviate some of these issues.
